mealDesc: Hamburger with vegetables and a slice of cheese in between buns with melted cheese on top of the burger, comes with standard drink and fries
1 pc chicken and rice with cheese melted on top, comes with standard drink and fries
2 pc Jumbo Hotdogs and rice with cheese melted on top, comes with standard drink and fries
Bowl of soup with cheese powder mixed in, comes with standard drink and fries
Extra Large serving of fries and nachos overloaded with cheese, comes with standard drink
Standard Beef Taco (Extra Sauce and Spice Sauce can be included for free), comes with standard drink
Standard Pork Taco (Extra Sauce and Spice Sauce can be included for free), comes with standard drink
Meat Free Taco (Extra Sauce and Spice Sauce can be included for free), comes with standard drink
Vegetable Free Beef Taco (Extra Sauce and Spice Sauce can be included for free), comes with standard drink
Vegetable Free Pork Taco (Extra Sauce and Spice Sauce can be included for free), comes with standard drink
Taco Filling on top of Rice (Type of Meat can be selected, Vegetables can be removed), comes with standard drink
